page.title: 12WORSHIP AT CROPWELL BUTLER
page.content: We used to have one special preacher for the{Anniversary Service}at Cropwell Butler, but now we have a concert party, a band, a singer or a musical evening. We have a wonderful candle-lit{Christmas Eve Service.}The {Sunday School}children perform a Nativity play as we sing our carols. To many people this really is their Christmas. Our joiner made the stable and crib with lantern. Lights are strung on the fir tree outside the Church and truly the Spirit of Christmas prevails. People love to come and meet their friends - it must bear such an influence on Village life. In July we had a{'Womens Work' meeting & ladies came from all over the circuit. The Church & tea-tables were beautifully decorated with roses, and lovely refreshments were provided.
